I would like to point out issues with the app and some suggestions for i2i in generally: App issues: very limited features, you can't really browse through all the details easily. Loan default rate is not easily available on the app. The details related to money are updated late on the app than the website. I am a user who only uses ap and they shall develop the app accordingly. Suggestions: I see all the loans on this platform are coming from NCR which means we are missing geographical diversification. I also noticed frequently there come loans for the employees of a single company, i.e. Yes Madam. This again puts investors at risk as the loans are skewed towards this company. Another this is there are lot of loans coming from MCD employees, which again reduces diversification and puts money at risk.
